setFilters(android.text.InputFilter[]).Description: Sets the list of input filters that will be used if the buffer is Editable. Has no effect otherwise.

setAllCaps(boolean).Description: Sets the properties of this field to transform input to ALL CAPS display. This may use a "small caps" formatting if available. This setting will be ignored if this field is editable or selectable. This call replaces the current transformation method. Disabling this will not necessarily restore the previous behavior from before this was enabled.

ClassDesc: TextView widget enhanced with emoji capability by using @B_android#support#text#emoji#widget#EmojiTextViewHelper_E@. When used on devices running API 18 or below, this widget acts as a regular https:##developer#android#com@B_android#widget#TextView_E@.
